titleStmt.title: A brief and perfect journal of the late preceedings and successe of the English army in the West-Indies, continued until June the 24th 1655. Together with some quæres inserted and answered. Published for satisfaction of all such who desire truly to be informed in these particulars. / By I.S. an eye-witnesse.
titleStmt.author: I. S.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
